direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve a variable, but getVarValue returns the value while getVar returns the Var object.
Both methods retrieve a value based on a key, but getMsg retrieves a message key instead of a variable value.
Both methods involve retrieving an object based on a key and an additional parameter (position for getArg).
Both methods access properties of an object, but getIndexedProperty accesses indexed properties.
Both methods involve processing and retrieving values, but validate performs validation and state changes.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require initialization of a parser or similar state setup.
Environment setup is required before retrieving variable values.
Both methods verify formats and handle similar exceptions.
